title: Urgot Sucks and Teemo is the weakest champion in the game, Riot hates them!
body:
do you even realize it's been like.. maybe a couple of years since urgot fix patch/rework whatever it is, should have been made. Riot rework champions slower than they release new "Lore" content, meanwhile every new champion is beyond fun to play because he is overloaded with options, unlike Boring one trick Pony Annie. is it any wonder so many noobs Yasuo are out there?, who wants to play a boring champion?.

Riot: "we didn't want vision to counter stealth champions Kit"

meanwhile a single upgraded Sweeper clears half the River side from Teemo shrooms. Hell it's so lazy no one even needs to attack them to remove them, they are disabled so you could just run over them like they're not even there.

"but you can play Teemo as an Hybrid fighter"
well in that case, why not take a real fighter?

Riot won't balance Teemo or Urgot for the same reason, anything under Gold is broken (no one even buys sweepers). everything above gold is useless garbage, considered as trolling.
